description: Excavation of a basement under footprint of the house and part of front and rear garden incorporating lightwells, demolition of existing rear conservatory and erection of a single storey glazed rear extension, removal of rear dormer and erection of new dormer window, installation of replacement rooflights, replacement/repair of windows, rebuilding of existing timber shed, installation of vehicular gates, installation of plant in enclosures at the side of the building, and general internal/external refurbishment works. (Linked to 20/03116/LBC)
